control_attributes.control_description: The information system: (a) Binds the identity of the information producer with the information to [Assignment: organization-defined strength of binding]; and(b) Provides the means for authorized individuals to determine the identity of the producer of the information
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization requires that the identity of individuals be preserved in cross-organizational audit trails.

Control Statement: The information system: (a) Binds the identity of the information producer with the information to [Assignment: organization-defined strength of binding]; and(b) Provides the means for authorized individuals to determine the identity of the producer of the information
